posts.title: Magnetic Air Vent Phone Mount
posts.content: Keep your phone handy at all times while you’re busy driving by placing it on the magnetic air vent mount. Made with rare earth magnets, they provide a strong grip while maintaining your phone or GPS at the perfect angle.

posts.title: Sword Popsicle Tray
posts.content: En garde! Now you can go to have duels with popsicles thanks to this clever sword popsicle ice tray. Featuring five different sword types, from scimitars to broad swords to sabres, the sword popsicle ice tray will have something for everyone.

posts.title: Shotgun 12 Gauge Shot Glasses
posts.content: These shotgun shot glasses are probably the only time you want to take a 12 gauge to the face. Makes a great gift for those who love guns, alcohol, and drinking. Also possibly the only fun way mix guns and alcohol and not have things end badly.

posts.title: Nothing Of Value Here Doormat
posts.content: Deter would-be criminals from burglarizing your humble abode by setting out this “nothing of value here” doormat. It’ll send a clear message that your home isn’t worth the effort – but hey maybe check out the Robertsons next door, they just got a new flat screen!

posts.title: Wooden Branches Colored Pencils
posts.content: Take your art back to its most primal element by using the wooden branches colored pencils to complete your latest masterpiece. As long as you don’t mind a splinter or two, these rustic colored pencils are just what you need to make your artwork really pop.

posts.title: Gun Shaped Screwdriver
posts.content: Fix your loose cabinet or any other appliance around the house with a few shots from the gun shaped screwdriver. This powerful rechargeable screwdriver is shaped like a revolver and stores up to six different drill bits so you can blast through any repair job.

posts.title: Playstation Console Messenger Bag
posts.content: Relive your glorious old-school gaming days all over again by accenting your outfit with the Playstation console messenger bag. Styled like the iconic original console, the bag features a main storage compartment, zip-up pocket, and adjustable strap.

posts.title: Finger Hockey Game
posts.content: Finger sports have kept us entertained for years in school and while at work, but these finger hockey games take it to a whole new level. Included in this desktop ice hockey set are finger goalie pads, one mini hockey stick, a mini puck and goal, and of course the ice rink.

posts.title: Foggy Mirror Wiper
posts.content: Now you can eliminate foggy bathroom mirrors using wiper technology akin to what your car’s windshield uses. The foggy mirror wiper is perfect for when you get out from a hot and steamy shower, allowing you to remove that foggy mirror with just a quick swipe.

posts.title: Inflatable Solar Lantern & Charger
posts.content: This inflatable solar lantern and charger is the versatile accessory that’s a must-have for your next outdoor excursion. This handy device provides a reliable light source and comes fitted with two built-in solar panels so that you can easily charge your electronic devices.

posts.title: Deep Fried Peanuts
posts.content: Experience a classic bar snack in whole new way by digging into some deep fried peanuts – with shell and all. These protein packed treats are high in fiber, feature an all round crunchy texture and come coated in delicious seasonings.

posts.title: Metal Chain Wine Stand
posts.content: Confuse your brain while storing your wine bottles with this clever metal chain bottle rack. The metal chain appears to be loosely hanging, but it is actually locked into it’s bottle holding position, making for an interesting wine rack for any home and a cool house warming gift.
